price: So prägt Allah keine Gleichnisse! Allah weiß, ihr aber wißt nicht.
arabic: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: falā taḍribū lillahi al-amthāla inna al-laha yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
